nodes.text: Josh Lee was the senior animatronic designer for Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, Solo: A Star Wars Story and Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. Among his work are the droid K-2SO (which he mechanized) and BB-8 (for which he was building supervisor and chief engineer on).
